input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 2''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='National Tree Company Canadian Grande Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='Latitude Run 8ft Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 9' Hinged'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Silverado Slim Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Bellevue Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Spruce Christmas Tree with Realistic Needles'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 3' White Iridescent Tinsel Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 7' Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 12-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company North Valley Spruce Tree'
  - Name='Haute Decor 36 Inch Unlit Flocked Stockhorn Potted Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company First Traditions Acacia Flocked Slim Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7 ft. PowerConnect Dunhill Fir Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 6.5-Ft. Flocked Silverton Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Christmas Time 7.5-ft. Norway Pine Artificial Christmas Tree with Clear LED String Lighting'
  - Name='National Tree Company Jersey Fraser Fir Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 5-ft Douglas Fir Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with White Incandescent Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Carolina Pine Tree'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 3-Ft. Snowy Downswept Tree with Clear Lights'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Latitude Run 8ft Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: While still an artificial fir tree, this is a slim profile and unlit, differing in size and fullness, making it moderately relevant but less so than Dunhill Fir trees.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 9' Hinged
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Dunhill Fir model, with hinged branches and a larger size, directly aligned in features and construction to the reference product, making it fully relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Silverado Slim Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand and a slim silhouette fir tree; less relevant due to brand and slimmer, less full profile compared to the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Bellevue Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species (spruce) and brand, with likely different needle shapes and branch styles, reducing relevance to a different type of tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir species from a different brand with a narrow profile; somewhat similar in type but different construction and brand, moderate relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Spruce Christmas Tree with Realistic Needles
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Spruce tree and different brand, so less relevant due to species and likely different branch design and density.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same fir type but from different brand and probably different fullness and style; moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 3' White Iridescent Tinsel Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different style, smaller size, with tinsel and white iridescent features making it quite different from the full, realistic Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 7' Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unlit, slim fir tree differing in fullness and lighting features; moderately relevant due to same basic construction type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 12-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and a fir variety with pre-lit features and larger size; construction likely different with downswept style, moderately high relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company North Valley Spruce Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different tree species (spruce) though same brand; less relevant due to different needle type and branch construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Haute Decor 36 Inch Unlit Flocked Stockhorn Potted Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smaller, unlit, flocked, potted tree from different brand and very different scale and style; low relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company First Traditions Acacia Flocked Slim Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different type (Acacia), flocked, slim profile and different material likely, so low relevance despite same brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7 ft. PowerConnect Dunhill Fir Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Dunhill Fir product line with clear lights and PowerConnectâ€”essentially a direct variant of the reference, very highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 6.5-Ft. Flocked Silverton Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand and a flocked fir variety; less relevant due to material finish and brand differences.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Christmas Time 7.5-ft. Norway Pine Artificial Christmas Tree with Clear LED String Lighting
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species (Norway Pine) and likely differing branch construction and needle shape, less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Jersey Fraser Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir tree of a different model but same brand; moderately relevant due to different branch construction and shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 5-ft Douglas Fir Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with White Incandescent Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar species and pre-lit feature but smaller size and different brand; moderate relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Carolina Pine Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species (pine) and likely branch structure despite same brand, less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 3-Ft. Snowy Downswept Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Small, snowy finish, downswept style, different brand and scale; low relevance.
